General.Name: Shanghai Huace Navigation Technology Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Huace Navigation Technology Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and integration of technology related to high-precision satellite navigation and positioning. It provides RTK, GIS, drone, 3D scanning, oceanographic mapping, precision positioning, beidou navigation, monitoring products, digital construction, precision agriculture, and photoelectric products. The company serves surveying and mapping, electricity, land, mine, Earth disaster, transportation, water resources and hydropower, agriculture, architecture, forestry, digital construction, and other industries. Shanghai Huace Navigation Technology Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
